Name: MQ_00001
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “I will do whatever I must to protect you from Erik when we attempt the Reactor. Almost, if we survive, I begin to believe that we can change things, and this I would see. I would have my people free, one day.”

Name: MQ_00002
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “I notice there are no servants here. Even nobility serves themselves. It must be insanely challenging for Erik and Darius. Are there no slaves as in Hasra?”

Name: MQ_00003
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Ah, well, I shouldn’t expect more. Remedying ignorance is my job, after all, but this will be quite the monumental task. The Hasran Settlement was first chartered during the height of Elentian power, long before the Fall bisected their empire with the Ashlands. You will simply love that chapter when we get there. Ash rained for a year and a day, sent by the Stewards as punishment for the Mad Emperor’s hubris. But I am getting ahead of myself, as I always do.”

Name: MQ_00004
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “I need a way to secure myself to friend Xal’s collar. Time permitting, I would have us construct or purchase a box lined with chain that I can hide in, sewn upon his back somehow.”

Name: MQ_00005
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “I am called Saghir.”

Name: MQ_00006
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Hasran Settlement,”

Name: MQ_00007
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “That scale is worth a thousand Hasran golden eagles, so yes, more than enough for the both of you. However, your training would be very different.”

Name: MQ_00008
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Friend Xal?”

Name: MQ_00009
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Friend Li,”

Name: MQ_00010
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Naunet, be sated. Atum, hold sway.”

Name: MQ_00011
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra

Name: MQ_00012
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “How the depths did you know to do that?”

Name: MQ_00013
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “The words came from the journal we landed last month.”

Name: MQ_00014
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “A trap like this can hold a disintegrate spell, but it can’t reset. That means that no one has been beyond this point. If they had, the spell would have to be inactive. We’re the first people here in decades.”

Name: MQ_00015
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra

Name: MQ_00016
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra

Name: MQ_00017
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra

Name: MQ_00018
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Brace yourself,”

Name: MQ_00019
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “Saghir, you and Jun seem to know the most about how Hasra works. Do you know what we’re walking into? All my mother told me was that if we lived, we’d get a choice. Money or school, like Darius said.”

Name: MQ_00020
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “You cannot afford to be a child any longer, Erik. You are the heir to the Hasran Imperium. You must think through every action, from every angle, as your mother has taught you.”

Name: MQ_00021
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “What did he mean about the Catalyst?”

Name: MQ_00022
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “that at the end of term we will be administered a series of final exams. If we pass those exams, then we will be granted access to the Reactor itself. You were in the palace. Do you remember when we arrived and you could see through the floor?”

Name: MQ_00023
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “A correct answer. How very rare. The first in your class today, unless you count Ephram, and he was held back last year for cowardice. How did you know when Olivanticus was killed?”

Name: MQ_00024
beat_desc: Inciting Incident — Reactor unrest in Hasra
dialogue: “There. I was able to fit the entire assessment into a single class. I am amazing. Now then…scurry away, little urchins, and find your next classes.”

Name: MQ_00025
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “That’s Princess Li,”

Name: MQ_00026
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “How about you defend your beliefs? Come out and fight, Princess. I’ll give you the chance I didn’t give Erik.”

Name: MQ_00027
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “The guardian is someone you’ve never met. Erik’s brother Ducius, the reincarnation of a powerful dreadlord. Olivanticus. Saghir is a member of their council.”

Name: MQ_00028
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “What of Princess Li?”

Name: MQ_00029
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Put away whatever notions you’ve got. She doesn’t date anyone who can’t beat her in a fight or at Kem, so that’s basically just Erik. Maybe Crispus.”

Name: MQ_00030
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Xalegos was the name. I suspect this is not the ﬁrst time you have heard it, friend Xal.”

Name: MQ_00031
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “I don’t suggest, Ducius. I speak directly.”

Name: MQ_00032
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Li, would you mind sending a missive to your mother to ask how far out she is? Invite her to a war council with Etrian and me, please. As politely as you can. Please, let her know she will have an equal voice and that we are eternally grateful for Calmoran assistance. And that her daughter has acquitted herself with honor.”

Name: MQ_00033
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue:
“If you’d like, she can conduct you to her people’s outpost. They’ve taken up
--- Page 562 ---
refuge at Temis’s manor and are actively repairing it. Saghir could officially attend a council meeting, and you could see the threat we face. We have actively begun to oppose the tree and reclaim some of the manors the forest took. One could be yours if you wish it.”

Name: MQ_00034
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “It will send everything at its disposal to stop us. In short… we will become the new target. That is how Master Ducius plans to stop the invasion.”

Name: MQ_00035
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “I am called Saghir.”

Name: MQ_00036
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “If you are serious about Erik,”

Name: MQ_00037
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “How soon can you get word to Xal?”

Name: MQ_00038
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Why do they call you princess?”

Name: MQ_00039
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “I hope it’s not rude to ask. I’m not trying to elevate myself or anything. I just thought you didn’t have princesses here.”

Name: MQ_00040
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “I would suggest that you bring your journey up for discussion during the council meeting.”

Name: MQ_00041
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “We will need a way to locate the soul. I know this is possible, but have no experience in such matters. It is possible the dread council can aid us. I will missive Liloth and see what she knows.”

Name: MQ_00042
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Give me the tour, dreadlord. Tell me of your dark council. I would know my allies before riding into battle together.”

Name: MQ_00043
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue:
“I didn’t see you there. I am Princess Li of
--- Page 193 ---
House Calmora.”

Name: MQ_00044
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “I have heard many tales of the Celestial Mountain and the wonders there. It is a true honor to meet you, even had you not saved us. Since you have, then I owe water debt to you and to Xal. Thank you, Princess.”

Name: MQ_00045
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “What was it you thought, Erik? That you would bring void-touched children into my palace, and what—you would be friends? Ride to war together?”

Name: MQ_00046
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “Should we retrieve Xal for the audience? Do you think Professor Vurmak will choose him in the induction? Will there be an induction?”

Name: MQ_00047
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “What did he mean about the Catalyst?”

Name: MQ_00048
beat_desc: Palace engagement — Princess Li sets the charge
dialogue: “that at the end of term we will be administered a series of final exams. If we pass those exams, then we will be granted access to the Reactor itself. You were in the palace. Do you remember when we arrived and you could see through the floor?”

Name: MQ_00049
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Let’s get the urchins fed quickly. They’re all flagging. We’ll get them into quarters and then report to my mother. I cannot believe what a single conscript achieved. We need to get him on a griffin before the next term. He’ll make us unstoppable in the arena.”

Name: MQ_00050
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Report to Prince Erik. You will obey his orders for the term, and your marks will reﬂect your quint’s performance.”

Name: MQ_00051
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Report to Princess Li. You will follow her order—”

Name: MQ_00052
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Report to Xal,”

Name: MQ_00053
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “My dear companions, fellow survivors of our horrific journey,”

Name: MQ_00054
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “We are off to find passage to the capital. If you would be so kind…the law requires that we report what occurred along the trail. There is a small Temple of Dalanthar. Perhaps it would be prudent for you to tell them whatever you think appropriate about our journey as you are of the faith?”

Name: MQ_00055
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “I’m sorry, Tissa. I should have predicted the assassin. That was sloppy. I will report myself to Lucretia. How did you know?”

Name: MQ_00056
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “You weren’t there,”

Name: MQ_00057
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Darius,”

Name: MQ_00058
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Morning, Ephram.”

Name: MQ_00059
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “We have bested Zaro and Dalanthar. A feat I’d not have thought possible. And, had Xal not won, Li would have. Which means we have the first and second place champion from the tourney. The Praetor will be pleased.”

Name: MQ_00060
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue:
“Besides, any goodwill you’ve bought will be erased by my inability to distinguish
--- Page 516 ---
myself. Gavius ‘survived school with passing marks’ doesn’t have the same ring to it as Ashianna, ‘champion of the sands.’”

Name: MQ_00061
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Li. Xal. Come with me. The rest of you, spend the day drilling or resting as your conscience dictates.”

Name: MQ_00062
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Apologies for the interruption, but Xal is the leader of our quint.”

Name: MQ_00063
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Master Saghir,”

Name: MQ_00064
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Good ﬁght, you two. Thandres favor you next week in the ﬁnals. Give Erik something to think about.”

Name: MQ_00065
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “And where does Erik stand on all this?”

Name: MQ_00066
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Erik is holding on to himself.”

Name: MQ_00067
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue:
“He struggles. Vhala watches over him, thankfully, and reports back to me when she has cause for concern. Erik is focused on winning the war and has accomplished much in that regard. He’s
--- Page 30 ---
turned six legions of conscripts into a real army, one the veteran legions are jealous of. One with high morale and loyalty to him.”

Name: MQ_00068
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Desidria has grown still more paranoid, and the eyeless report directly to her. If she finds you…it would go poorly, and worse for anyone caught near you. Remember that, Xal. Your presence in this city is a threat to everyone you love.”

Name: MQ_00069
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “A better question for Ducius maybe.”

Name: MQ_00070
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “E-erik is dead.”

Name: MQ_00071
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Saghir, Ena, and I can take care of it.”

Name: MQ_00072
beat_desc: Archive breach — truth of the erased report
dialogue: “Then we go on foot. Saghir, will you set us down on the edge of the wood? Will you be going with us or staying with the ship?”

Name: MQ_00073
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Erik told me that you’ve been working after it for years. That you’ve made a lot of progress. He thinks Li should just kill you.”

Name: MQ_00074
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “And is it as lethal as walking around seems to be? Erik killed that man, and no one blinked twice. Will he face some sort of charges?”

Name: MQ_00075
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I am called Saghir.”

Name: MQ_00076
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Erik said that?”

Name: MQ_00077
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “That boy, not a man, picked a ﬁght. He deserved what he got. His parents and siblings will hate Erik, but they already hated Erik. They hate everything Hasran.”

Name: MQ_00078
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “We’ve fought Crispus and won. And Erik and won.”

Name: MQ_00079
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “You’ll see them all over our kingdom. They’re the most eﬀicient way we use limited space.”

Name: MQ_00080
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Wild sky rice was the ﬁrst crop we domesticated after we settled here. The plants ﬂock in the sky looking for sources of water, but air mages drag them down to settlements where they can be tended to properly.”

Name: MQ_00081
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Naunet, be sated. Atum, hold sway.”

Name: MQ_00082
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody

Name: MQ_00083
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “How the depths did you know to do that?”

Name: MQ_00084
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I—who are you?”

Name: MQ_00085
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “No offense has been given.”

Name: MQ_00086
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I am called Kalika. The chalice bears the blood of Rakta-Bija, a dangerous thing but one we have harnessed to our purpose. If you drink it, the blood will sustain you, but not in the same way as the blood of the forgotten god. Drinking of the Rakta burdens with hunger. You will crave the blood of the living, but in the consumption gain the magic of those you devour.”

Name: MQ_00087
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody

Name: MQ_00088
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Do you like it?”

Name: MQ_00089
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Enurian forged. Did you know their whole economy was centered around mining a single deposit of ore? You can guess how that ended up.”

Name: MQ_00090
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “It sounds like Erik is taking us to meet the Imperator. His mother.”

Name: MQ_00091
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Saghir, you and Jun seem to know the most about how Hasra works. Do you know what we’re walking into? All my mother told me was that if we lived, we’d get a choice. Money or school, like Darius said.”

Name: MQ_00092
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Friend Ashianna, might you explain what an archetype is and what picking one means?”

Name: MQ_00093
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “I’m Professor Jera.”

Name: MQ_00094
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Will this coin be enough to train the both of us?”

Name: MQ_00095
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “Welcome to the Guild weaponeer.”

Name: MQ_00096
beat_desc: Khalir’s Vault — relic and custody
dialogue: “We all played a role, but Xal is right. Ephram’s quick thinking and Saghir’s efforts won us that fight. Xal stopped Crispus, but you don’t see him trying to steal credit.”

Name: MQ_00097
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “You know something of this. Your demonic friends probably know more. Curiosity is my downfall, friend Xal. If we are witnessing the fulﬁllment of some prophecy, I must know.”

Name: MQ_00098
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “There was no prophecy because if there were, Xal would still be alive. And now he’s gone. Like Nef.”

Name: MQ_00099
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We’ve fought Crispus and won. And Erik and won.”

Name: MQ_00100
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue:
“Friend Xal knows that my greatest wish is to become an archmage. Yet my needs are second to prophecy. To saving my people. But if we all
--- Page 497 ---
desire this…then I will do all in my power to cloak our approach.”

Name: MQ_00101
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “If Erik turns on me, well, I am confident I can defend myself. But I also think he’ll make a fine leader. And as for corralling eradicators? Erik asked me to lead him to the lake, and I did. Erik is an eradicator himself. Stained in the same way we are. He can’t very well demand one fate for us and a separate for himself. That’s mutual destruction. The people would pull him down. Enestius would seize the throne. I fully expect Erik to bring eradicators to Valys if he defects.”

Name: MQ_00102
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I know a fine druid, one of my people, who is incredibly gifted at healing. I believe that Ephram is fated to be this Tree’s guardian and that he can help it recover more swiftly than any other. He is small, and weak, and timid, and he will need your protection. But you will not have to do it alone. “The Fomori are a race of giants, a race birthed by the mother, who planted this Tree. The mother has been reborn and is searching for a ward. It was for her that we stole the sapling so recently.”

Name: MQ_00103
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “That was Ephram. I am certain of it. Running afoul of an elemental, perhaps. We cannot go back. Put it from your mind. His fate is his own.”

Name: MQ_00104
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I will also choose pierce all veils, master, for the same reason as Xal, but also because divination is the greater path I most wish to study. Prophecy is highly prized in Gateway, where I am from.”

Name: MQ_00105
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “What are you suggesting?”

Name: MQ_00106
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “That you are a reincarnated demon god?”

Name: MQ_00107
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge

Name: MQ_00108
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “What are the other quints like?”

Name: MQ_00109
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Anyone want to back out?”

Name: MQ_00110
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Let’s be oﬀ then.”

Name: MQ_00111
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge

Name: MQ_00112
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “These are free?”

Name: MQ_00113
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “She lied to me,”

Name: MQ_00114
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “We have come to aid my friend,”

Name: MQ_00115
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I believe he may be important to the future of our people. I do not know this Xal, nor do I care about his fate. But Saghir cares, and so I will aid him in this.”

Name: MQ_00116
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “When we going to eat? Gakk ﬁne eating magic.”

Name: MQ_00117
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I hadn’t dared hope for the opportunity to acquire water,”

Name: MQ_00118
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “Xal, of the hand of fate.”

Name: MQ_00119
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I will go next,”

Name: MQ_00120
beat_desc: Oracles' Offer — price of knowledge
dialogue: “I mean if there is a tomb for me.”

Name: MQ_00121
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “The one you should fear is called Ducius. He will win the tourney. He will also win any tactical battles we participate in. One day, he will likely control all the Garulan fortunes.”

Name: MQ_00122
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I don’t suggest, Ducius. I speak directly.”

Name: MQ_00123
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Soﬁa! Take your dec and secure the dims along the tall walls there. Clear the Fomori, but don’t take any risks. Ashianna, watch her position. Be prepared to send reinforcements if she gets into trouble.”

Name: MQ_00124
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Anyone not away on assignment is here, and friends and family are permitted from the city to watch. Erik’s family isn’t there, but some of the others might want to watch their children pummel us into paste.”

Name: MQ_00125
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “This is what Saghir feels like.”

Name: MQ_00126
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “And is it as lethal as walking around seems to be? Erik killed that man, and no one blinked twice. Will he face some sort of charges?”

Name: MQ_00127
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “That boy, not a man, picked a ﬁght. He deserved what he got. His parents and siblings will hate Erik, but they already hated Erik. They hate everything Hasran.”

Name: MQ_00128
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “We’ve fought Crispus and won. And Erik and won.”

Name: MQ_00129
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “And I get it now. Erik will eventually take the crown, and when he does, will need to make changes that Crispus or his father might oppose. That about the size of it?”

Name: MQ_00130
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “See you on the sands, Xal,”

Name: MQ_00131
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I feel the arena does not know Erik, then,”

Name: MQ_00132
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Each pair of students will be given a match. The winner stays in the seat until they lose unless they have a desire to challenge another winner. The losers play until they’ve played everyone, so long after the rest of us lowly mortal players know Li will win, we’ll still have to take our punishment from Erik and Darius. All you have to do is win one game for passing marks though.”

Name: MQ_00133
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ephram?”

Name: MQ_00134
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “that the battle is as close to equal as it can get. The arena believes we are about to witness a momentous battle of incredible skill and does not believe it can add to the spectacle. Erik and Crispus are on equal terms.”

Name: MQ_00135
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “What are your orders?”

Name: MQ_00136
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “I’m oﬀicially promoting you to my second. If I retain the rank of Praetor, you will be elevated to legatus. In today’s combat, you will take charge of the second half of our forces. For now, lead everyone out and get them mounted up, then send a missive to your father requesting his assistance. Xal, please remain behind. I’d like your thoughts on our assault strategy.”

Name: MQ_00137
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Li, would you mind sending a missive to your mother to ask how far out she is? Invite her to a war council with Etrian and me, please. As politely as you can. Please, let her know she will have an equal voice and that we are eternally grateful for Calmoran assistance. And that her daughter has acquitted herself with honor.”

Name: MQ_00138
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ashianna, Gavius, this is Xal, and his little friend is Saghir. They’re joining our house. They’re in your year, too, Ashianna.”

Name: MQ_00139
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Ashianna is going.”

Name: MQ_00140
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
dialogue: “Friend Ashianna, might you explain what an archetype is and what picking one means?”

Name: MQ_00141
beat_desc: Confrontation — Ducius/Voss/Ashianna stakes
